Subscription.Description: Spotting the Adversary with Windows Event Log Monitoring
Subscription.Query: <QueryList><Query Id="0"><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/EXE and DLL">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=8003 or EventID=8004 or EventID=8006 or EventID=8007)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/MSI and Script">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=8003 or EventID=8004 or EventID=8006 or EventID=8007)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Deployment">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=8003 or EventID=8004 or EventID=8006 or EventID=8007)]]</Select><Select Path="Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker/Packaged app-Execution">*[System[Provider[@Name='Microsoft-Windows-AppLocker'] and (Level=2 or Level=3) and (EventID=8003 or EventID=8004 or EventID=8006 or EventID=8007)]]</Select></Query></QueryList>
